item.title: Autumm season starts in September
item.dc:creator: Andy Melville
item.description: The movies aren't chosen yet, but we can confirm that the Autumn season will start in mid-September. Hope to see you there!

item.title: Advance tickets almost gone
item.dc:creator: Andy Melville
item.description:
Just to let you know, advance ticket sales for the Armistice 100 showing are almost gone now---we're down to the last 10. There will be limited tickets available on the door.

We feel very privileged to be one of only 11 selected cinemas nationally to be screening the Burying Party.

item.title: Armistice 100 price is back to £5!
item.dc:creator: Andy Melville
item.description: We're pleased to announce that, because of the huge demand for 10th November Armistice 100 tickets, we have reduced the admission price to the standard £5 again. Also, to cater for the increased demand we won't be putting out tables for this event, so table reservations won't be available. Sorry about that!

item.title: Armistice 100 double-bill on 10th November!
item.dc:creator: Andy Melville
item.description: As part of the Ampthill Armistice 100 events, we are showing a double-bill of films on the evening of 10th November. Because of this, for that evening only, the admission price will be £7.50.
